channel.title: CVE Feed for Yokogawa Electric Corporation -- CENTUM VP / CS 3000 controller FCS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yokogawa Electric Corporation -- CENTUM VP / CS 3000 controller FCS

item.title: CVE-2022-33939|2024-08-03T08:16:15.879Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20vp%20%2F%20cs%203000%20controller%20fcs
item.description: CENTUM VP / CS 3000 controller FCS (CP31, CP33, CP345, CP401, and CP451) contains an issue in processing communication packets, which may lead to resource consumption. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker may cause a denial of service (DoS) condition in ADL communication by sending a specially crafted packet to the affected product.
